fields.Title: Anika Smulovitz | Judaica
fields.Description/Abstract:
This 66 page catalogue of Jewish Ritual Objects created by artist/metalsmith Anika Smulovitz includes an introductory essay by Daniel Belasco, Curator of Exhibitions and Programs of the Samuel Dorskly Museum of Art at SUNY New Paltz. The catalogue is broken up into four sections: Torah, Shabbat, Mezuzah, Hanukah. Each section includes explanatory and descriptive text, as well as beautiful photographs of related objects. Layout and Design by Jennifer Wood. 

Anika Smulovitz, author, Anika Smulovitz | Judaica, Essay by Daniel Belasco, Blurb.com, 2015.  ISBN: 9781320730099
